content.text:
# List of national monuments of cultural heritage in Donetsk Oblast

List of cultural heritage monuments of national significance in Donetsk Oblast.
Listings
{| class="wikitable"
|-
! No. !! Photo !! Name !! Date !! Location !! Type !! Protected number
|-
| 1 || || Amvrosiivka bone site, stay site || 1.5 million – 10 thousand years BCE || Amvrosiivka Raion, Amvrosiivka || monument of archaeology || 050001-N
|-
| 2 ||  || Manor house of theatre industry member, one of founders of the MKHAT Vladimir Nemirovich-Danchenko || start of 20th century, 1903 || Velyka Novosilka Raion, village Neskuchne, vulytsia V. Nemyrovycha-Danchenka || monument of history || 050002-N
|-
| 3 ||  || Monument of Soviet partisan and state figure Artyom (Fyodor Sergeyev) || 1927 || Sviatohirsk, Artyom Mount || monument of monumental art || 050003-N
|-
| 4 || || Hillfort "Sviatohorske" || 5th-9th century || Sloviansk Raion, village Bohorodychne || monument of archaeology || 050004-N
|-
| 5 || || Hillfort "Teplynske" || 5th-9th century || Sloviansk Raion, village Bohorodychne || monument of archaeology || 050005-N
|-
| 6 || || Tsaryne hillfort || 5th-9th, 9th-13th centuries || Sloviansk Raion, village Maiaky|| monument of archaeology || 050006-N
|-
| 7 || || Sydorivske hillfort || 5th-9th, 9th-13th centuries || Sloviansk Raion, village Sydorove || monument of archaeology || 050007-N
|-
| 8 || || Kurgan burial || 3rd millennium BCE – 14th century || Sloviansk Raion, settlement Kolosky || monument of archaeology || 050008-N
|-
| 9 || || Kurgan burial "Black (Chorna) Grave" || 3rd millennium BCE – 14th century || Sloviansk Raion, village Petrivske || monument of archaeology || 050009-N
|-
| 10 || || Grave of Pasha Angelina, twice Hero of Socialist Labour || 1959 || Starobesheve Raion, Starobesheve || monument of history || 050010-N
|-
| 11 || || Kurgan burial || 3rd millennium BCE – 14th century || Telmanove Raion, village Hranitne || monument of archaeology || 050011-N
|-
| 12 || || Kurgan "Black (Chorna) Grave" || 3rd millennium BCE – 14th century || Telmanove Raion, village Fedorivka || monument of archaeology || 050012-N
|-
| 13 ||  || Memorial complex "Savur-Mohyla" || 1943, 1967–1975 || Shakhtarsk Raion, Saurivka || monument of history || 050013-N
|}
List of historic and cultural reserves
* State Historic and Architectural Reserve in Sviatohirsk
List of scientific objects of national inheritance (heritage)
Note: it is a mixed list that includes objects of both cultural heritage as well as natural heritage with emphasis on science.
* Geological landscape and biological diversity of biota of the "Stone (Kamiani) Graves" Reserve (village Nazarivka)
* Exposition "Steppes of Ukraine" of the Donetsk Botanic Garden
* Exposition and collection of tropical and subtropical plants of the Donetsk Botanic Garden
* Complex of unique installations and accessories to test high voltage electrical equipment of insulating structures of the State company "Scientific and Research Institute of High Voltage" (Sloviansk)
* Test site of high-voltage lines supports of power transmissions and tower structures of the Donbas State Academy of Construction and Architecture (Makiivka)
References
* [http://zakon1.rada.gov.ua/laws/show/928-2009-%D0%BF/page Rada.gov.ua: Objects of cultural heritage of national significance in the State Registry of Immobile monuments of Ukraine] — 2009 Resolution of Cabinet of Ministers of Ukraine.
